title: ON1 Photo 10.5.0.2943 (x64) for Windows - CORE
description:
ON1 Photo 10 includes ON1's entire collection of apps: Browse, Effects, Resize, Portrait, Enhance, and Layers.
Photo 10 works as a plug-in to AdobeÂ® PhotoshopÂ® and LightroomÂ®, and as a standalone application.

Tech Specs

Release date: 25/04/2016
Windows: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (current maintenance releases, 64 bit)
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Xeon, or better processors(s)
RAM: 4 GB (8 GB when used as a Photoshop plug-in)
Hard Drive: 1.5 GB for installation
Display: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB video RAM, 1280x720 resolution

Integration

Plug-ins for Adobe Photoshop CS6, CC, CC 2014, or CC 2015
Plug-ins for Adobe Photoshop Elements 11, 12, 13, or 14
Plug-ins for Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 4, 5, CC, or CC 2015

Photo editing made simple

A full-featured photo editor that works as a plug-in to AdobeÂ® PhotoshopÂ® and LightroomÂ®, or as a standalone application. Browse and manage photos wherever you keep them; on your computer, an external drive or cloud service. Photo 10 includes the necessary tools to manage and edit your photos with non-destructive Smart Photo technology. Enhance color and detail, improve portraits, add effects, share, or swap faces and backgrounds easily. Photo 10 is a full featured editor.

Effects
Everything you need to add any effect to your photos. ON1 Effects includes filters, presets, borders, and textures. With live adjustments, stack effects to create your own look, and save your own custom presets. Hundreds of presets and 23 stackable filters.

Resize
Get the highest quality photo enlargements, which features Genuine FractalsÂ® technologyâ€”patented, fractal-based interpolation algorithmsâ€”that quickly enlarge your photos without the loss of sharpness or detail.

Browse
Don't wait on a slow catalog or import process. This is a lightning fast photo browser. Quickly sort, cull and edit photos from a shoot. Quickly ditch the bad ones, rate the good ones, add keywords, and much more.

Enhance
Quickly and easily adjust exposure, contrast, white balance, vibrance, detail, or add vignettes. Store all of your settings and adjustments of the enhancements for future use.

- Color correction
- Exposure adjustment
- Highlight & Shadow recovery
- Retouch brush
- Erase objects
- Noise reduction

Portrait
Portrait retouching is faster, better, and easier than ever. Our new way of working with facial features makes it easier to retouch the areas you care about.

- Skin retouching made easy
- Skin smoothing
- Blemish reduction
- Shine removal
- Advanced color correction technology
- Get color correct skin tones
- Brighten eyes
- Whiten teeth

Layers
Create composites by stacking photos or combine and blend photos without having to use AdobeÂ® PhotoshopÂ®.

- Precise masking tools
- Swap out boring backgrounds
- Create your own layouts
- Includes backgrounds, borders, and edges
- Create layered files from Lightroom
- Blend photos together

Share or Print
Post your photos edited from ON1 Photo 10 directly toTwitter, Messages, Mail, Flickr and more. Set any photo to print from any module in Photo 10.

Simplified Batch Processing
Along with the new export feature, we've simplified batch processing. Create your own presets and use from any ON1 Photo 10 app.

Features list https://www.on1.com/apps/on1photo10/feature-list/
Homepage https://www.on1.com/apps/on1photo10/
